video.title: Her Mother's Killer
video.synopsis: Nearly 30 years after her mom's murder, a political strategist launches a calculated plan to ruin the Colombian presidential candidate who killed her.

episodes.synopsis: Analía, a political strategist in Mexico, decides it's finally time to return to her native Colombia to avenge the murder of her mother decades ago.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Mejía blackmails his driver, Carrasco, into accepting a terrible mission. While searching for Ana Lucía, Inés discovers a disturbing clue.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Reports of Ana Lucía being seen alive begin to surface. The police find Mejía's car. Unscrupulous lawyer Fabiola pays Mejía an unwelcome visit.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: An old army buddy covers Mejía's tracks. A fateful sighting changes the course of Ana Lucía's life. In 2020, Analía recruits help for her revenge plan.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Analía battles a competitor for the job as Mejía's strategist and comes face-to-face with her mom's killer — and Pablo — for the first time in 28 years.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Pablo discusses Mejía's offer with his family. In search of Toto and Dorita, Analía returns to the neighborhood where she was held captive as a child.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Analía's publicity stunt boosts Mejía's image, but hurts another's. To become indispensable to Mejía, Analía takes advantage of his son's weaknesses.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: After completing his jail sentence, Juan Mario does the interview that his father promised to Mónica Ramos. Benji captures on film a secret rendezvous.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When his son refuses to do another interview or go to rehab, Mejía takes a tough-love stance that pushes Juan Mario to an emotional brink.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and Analía open up to each other about their personal lives. Sofía tries to break up with Nacho. Juan Mario allows his dad to take him to rehab.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Against Analía's orders, Benji visits the estate where Juan Mario is being held to capture proof on video. Carolina struggles to keep her secret hidden.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Pablo and Carolina discuss their marriage. Eugenia's foundation event is held at the de la Torre estate, where Analía discreetly questions a housemaid.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Sofía is abducted. At the foundation event, the arrival of an unexpected guest causes a stir. Mauricio refuses to give up on Carolina.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Analía recommends a controversial course of action and enlists Toto's help to ensure its success. Sofía calls Nacho by his name and begs for mercy.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Analía leads an operation to rescue Sofía. Mejía orders a hit on Nacho. Planning for her future, Rosario gives her son a secret mission.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Pablo shares news that proves too stressful for his dad to handle. Marta, Inés's former co-worker, is found. Santiago's investigator is caught spying.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Analía enlists Dorita's help to convince Liliana to meet with Mejía. Pablo takes over the family business and finances, much to Mejía's dismay.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Carolina drops a bombshell on her husband. Sofía gives her brother an idea on how he can repair his public image. Benji tracks down Inés's daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Fresh out of prison, Fabiola pays a visit to Mejía. To control the auditor, Santiago tries to dig up some dirt on him. Mejía has his wife followed.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Analía meets Mejía's new hire: Fabiola. Pablo gets the DNA test results. Juan Mario finds his own way to contribute to his father's campaign.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Carolina misinterprets a heart-to-heart with Pablo. An attack spurs Otoniel to pump Yeferson for intel. Pablo witnesses Mark visiting Analía at home.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: A heated argument between Carolina and Pablo leads to an accident. Rosario hatches a deal with Mark, unaware their meeting is being closely monitored.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Carolina threatens to reveal Pablo and Analía's secret relationship. Worried about Pablo, Eugenia confides in Mejía while he's visiting her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Mejía confronts Analía with Carolina's claims about her. Carolina gets a new lawyer, Fabiola, who coaches her client and takes her on a press tour.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Isabella is tasked with finding out who the man in the photo is. Juan Mario interviews Pérez. At the debate, Mark makes an accusation against Mejía.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The debate participants take questions from the audience, one of which hits too close to home. Toto tries to find out what Santiago's key is for.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Analía tells Mejía he must reconnect with his estranged daughter. Pablo demands total honesty from Analía. Toto follows Santiago to his storage unit.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: After her husband agrees to her terms, Rosario calls Alejandra. Benji digs up dirt from Carolina's past. Analía decides how she'll use Santiago's video.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra makes a statement to the press about her father, while Pablo speaks out publicly about his wife. Manuel José conveys his last wishes.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Mejía regains the upper hand over Fabiola. An unlikely hero comes to Dorita's rescue. Pérez decides who will run for vice president on his ticket.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Analía's adoptive mother plays the only card she has left to try to stop her daughter's pursuit of revenge. Sofía eavesdrops on her parents.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: After Fabiola reminds Mejía what she knows about him, he gives the Engineer an order. During a routine doctor visit, Carolina gets a twisted idea.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Mark overhears Pablo on the phone with Analía and decides to follow him. Posing as a digital services salesperson, Benji arranges to meet Sofía.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: When Mark tells Analía what he saw, she must decide whether she trusts that he won't tell Mejía. Sofía asks her mom about the accusation she overheard.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Mejía tells Pablo his relationship with Analía will be revealed to the press if he doesn't drop out of the VP race. Dorita starts working for Mejía.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Mejía and Liliana face off against Pérez and Pablo in a radio-show debate. It starts off with a bang when Mejía calls into question Pablo's morality.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Mejía begins to question who his former strategist really is. Leaders of the Democratic Force party discuss the accusation made against Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: When Heli falls ill again, her test results make Pablo suspicious. Fabiola escapes from the warehouse. Santiago asks a contact in Mexico about Analía.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Mejía orders the Engineer to abduct Toto. Juan Mario learns who visited Darelis's grave. Pablo puts his mom in charge of Heli, but Carolina interferes.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Juan Mario starts drinking again. Mejía and the Engineer barge into Analía's home. Santiago comes clean to his sister about the accusation against him.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Toto tries to escape from his captors. Fabiola decodes Mejía's notes. When Santiago continues to deny his guilt at a hearing, Pablo issues a threat.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Analía decides it's time to make Rosario her ally. Pablo secretly installs hidden cameras in his home. Mejía becomes suspicious of Dorita.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Toto ignores Analía's warning and decides to kill the Engineer. Analía arranges a meeting with Rosario to convince her to use Santiago's evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Liliana opens up to Alejandra about her failed marriage. Juan Mario finds a mysterious set of keys in his uncle's car. Santiago is threatened in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Mark suggests an idea that makes Pablo suspect Analía is working with him. During the debate in Sincelejo, Mejía brings up Pablo's personal life again.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Mejía asks Analía to come back as his campaign strategist, and later orders Dorita to come to his hotel room alone. Yeferson gives Heli a pep talk.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: When Mejía arranges for all the candidates to make a joint statement at a venue, Analía senses something is off, so Isabella volunteers to attend.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Analía arrives at the scene and searches among the wreckage for survivors. When she encounters Mejía, she can no longer control her emotions.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Presidential candidate Magda Meneses speaks privately with Pablo. Journalist Salvador shows his boss what Rosario gave him. Analía revisits Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Sofía meets with journalist Esteban. Analía gets a drunken call from Juan Mario, who mentions a detail about his mother that catches her attention.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Mejía meets privately with Mark, and later visits Santiago, who plays hardball with him. Juan Mario finds something in one of his mom's suitcases.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Magda makes a decision. Benji locates one of Mejía's past victims. Analía realizes she needs the Engineer's help, and Dorita is the key to getting it.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Santiago asks Juan Mario to flee abroad with him. Eugenia makes a confession to her son. Analía uses the evidence she's collected to make new allies.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Sofía is forced to face the truth about her father. Eugenia tries to convince Yamile to report Mejía for rape. The Engineer takes Analía by surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Benji tries to explain his feelings to Sofía. Dorita has a heart-to-heart with the Engineer. Pablo gives Analía an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: The videos of Mejía's victims telling their stories are posted on social media. Analía and her team worry that Mejía may flee or get a light sentence.
episodes.title: Episode 56
